content: I am a little late to getting around to this, but shoutout to the other creators that did this for the community! I think it was a great gesture, and I want to do the same for you all. Up for raffle is a loaded mybits series 2 set of three coins! each coin is loaded with .001 BTC the photo below is what the coins look like but not the exact set. I will choose a matching serial number for the three coinsÂ Â RULESÂ Â - Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Â Â - Requirements: Jr Member and up .
